messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] t-shirt orders
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Kelly....Please order me an adult XLG and Adult med.  Let me know if you need them prepaid.  I would have already registered, but things are such that I
messages.messageBody:
Hey Kelly....Please order me an adult XLG and Adult med. Let me know
if you need them prepaid. I would have already registered, but
things are such that I won't literally know until the last minute if
I can make it or not. I appreciate the heads up though. Thanks!!


Christina in Seattle

>
>I will be ordering a *few* extra, but don't plan on buying one at the
>conference. You *might* luck out, but I wouldn't hold my breath! They
>really need to be pre-ordered!
>
>Thanks for making my day/life easier! <g>

messages.subject: t-shirt orders
messages.msgSnippet: I need to place to t-shirt order BEFORE the end of this month in order to have them in time for the conference. If you re not ready to register yet but think
messages.messageBody:
I need to place to t-shirt order BEFORE the end of this month in order
to have them in time for the conference.

If you're not ready to register yet but think you'd like a t-shirt or
two, please order at least the t-shirt!!!

I will be ordering a *few* extra, but don't plan on buying one at the
conference. You *might* luck out, but I wouldn't hold my breath! They
really need to be pre-ordered!

Thanks for making my day/life easier! <g>

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
October 6-9, 2005
http://liveandlearnconference.org
